name: Density Training – 10-Min AMRAP
time_per_session_breakdown: One 10 min continuous block of repeated short sets
overview_and_execution: Pick a movement and load. In 10 min, do as many total reps as possible in small sets (e.g., sets of 3-5). Rest briefly as needed to keep form. Tally total reps. Try to improve next session.
example_application: 10-min AMRAP Back Squat @ 135 lb. Perform sets of 5, rest ~15s, go again. Score = total reps in 10 min.
important_notes: Manage pacing. Don’t burn out too quickly. Useful for hypertrophy and GPP. Keep consistent form as fatigue sets in.
